parameters: Madre_Ahmed
As you have seen, these situations could
happen to you many times in life, having
a good inner dialogue is the key to
interact positively with everyone.
Madre_Ahmed
The more you practice the more you will learn! Y
there will come a time when
automatically your internal dialogue will always be
positive.
The end.
Sympathy
Action
Reflection
Reflection
Sympathy
These are used in social situations, as general rule,
no one wants to hurt us, but there are times
in which we think ill of people and say things to each other
like: "is laughing at me", "I can't stand this guy"... etc.
If we continually tell ourselves this, it makes us
let's get more angry. In order to not to talk to each other like that,
we must say phrases like: "be kind", "smile", "treat others as you want
them to treat you", "today for you, tomorrow for me"
Action
Reflection
Reflection
Action
These are for when we are demotivated, when
we have to do a task but we don't want to do it,
also when we have to face situations
that we don't want to face
In these cases we say phrases like: "I'll do it after watching the TV,
"I'm bored", "I'll do it another day"....
If we continually tell ourselves this, it causes us to continue not
doing our homework. In order not to talk to ourselves this way,
we have to say phrases like: "first the obligation and then the fun",
"the sooner I start, the sooner I will finish "...
Reflection
Reflection
Reflection
These are for when we act impulsively without thinking
the consequences. We tell ourselves phrases like: "I answer
the first thing that comes to my mind", "I don't care how it
comes out", "I do the first thing that comes to my mind"...
If we continually says this to ourselves, we will make mistakes
that  we can regret.
In order not to talk to each other like that, we have to say phrases like:
"stop and think", "do not be hasty", "think before you speak",
"organize yourself", "slowly", "I'll think about what I have
to do"....
Reflection
Reflection
These are for when we focus only on our
failures and the things that we are bad at. We tell ourselves
phrases like: "I have failed again", "I will never succeed",
"so much effort for nothing", "I always mess up"...
If we continually tell this to ourselves , it makes the situation worse
and we don't look for solutions
In order not to talk to each other like that, you have
to say phrases like: "well done", "Great!", "I'm getting
closer", "the next time I'll get it", "I'm improvign
myself", "we all make mistakes"... etc.

we have to do a task but we don't want to do it,
also when we have to face situations
that we don't want to face
In these cases we say phrases like: "I'll do it after watching the TV,
"I'm bored", "I'll do it another day"....
If we continually tell ourselves this, it causes us to continue not
doing our homework. In order not to talk to ourselves this way,
we have to say phrases like: "first the obligation and then the fun",
"the sooner I start, the sooner I will finish "...

Sympathy
Reflection
Sympathy
These are used in social situations, as general rule,
no one wants to hurt us, but there are times
in which we think ill of people and say things to each other
like: "is laughing at me", "I can't stand this guy"... etc.
If we continually tell ourselves this, it makes us
let's get more angry. In order to not to talk to each other like that,
we must say phrases like: "be kind", "smile", "treat others as you want
them to treat you", "today for you, tomorrow for me"
Reflection
Reflection
These are for when we act impulsively without thinking
the consequences. We tell ourselves phrases like: "I answer
the first thing that comes to my mind", "I don't care how it
comes out", "I do the first thing that comes to my mind"...
If we continually says this to ourselves, we will make mistakes
that  we can regret.
In order not to talk to each other like that, we have to say phrases like:
"stop and think", "do not be hasty", "think before you speak",
"organize yourself", "slowly", "I'll think about what I have
to do"....
